fields.python_parse:
meminfos = dict([(info.split(':')[0].strip(), int(info.split()[1].strip())/1024) for info in output.splitlines()])
output = ";".join([str(meminfos['MemFree']), str(meminfos['Buffers']), str(meminfos['MemTotal'] - meminfos['MemFree'] - meminfos['Buffers'])])

meminfos = dict([(info.split(':')[0].strip(), int(info.split()[1].strip())) for info in output.splitlines()])
output = ";".join([str(meminfos['MemFree']), str(meminfos['Buffers']), str(meminfos['MemTotal'] - meminfos['MemFree'] - meminfos['Buffers'])])

meminfos = dict([(info.split(':')[0].strip(), int(info.split()[1].strip()) / 1024) for info in output.splitlines()])
output = ";".join([str(meminfos['SwapFree']), str(meminfos['SwapTotal'] - meminfos['SwapFree'])])

bdwth = dict([(info.split()[0].strip(), int(info.split()[1].strip()) / 1024) for info in output.splitlines()])
output = ";".join([str(bdwth['IpExtInOctets']), str(bdwth['IpExtOutOctets'])])
